lines.text: One of the basic rules of chess is that the king rarely moves.
That's why so few women play it.
Where did you get your luck, Valerie? Or does God pity the wicked?
The trouble with her is that she's here today and here tomorrow.
Do you mind not calling me 'darling?' You toss affection around as though it were in mass production.
And you prefer individual attention?
Yes
Gordon's the perfect host. He wants to make you feel at home... and wishes you were.
You'd better have some food. You're going to need all your strength to answer my questions.
Oh, thank you, but I'm on the nine-day diet.
Oh, are you? What day is this?
Wednesday.
Now don't do anything until I've said you've done it.
How could I?
I'll give you the lead in tomorrow's column.
Thanks, I'll settle for a drink.
No! No she didn't! Marian didn't kill herself!
No choice?
I told you. With me you take everything on faith.
I've already told him!
But not what I'll tell him! I'll tell him things that'll make want to wash his hands every time he touches you! And what I don't know I'll invent! I think I'll go now, while I'm in the mood.
